description: Host Greg Bluestein and Tamar Hallerman took a look at the broader messages candidates have aimed toward the middle of the electorate during the general election campaign for Georgia governor. Bluestein and Hallerman also provide an update on Georgia's 6th Congressional District race.
title: A look at Abrams, Kemp's appeals to Georgia's mainstream middle
title_page: A look at Abrams, Kemp's appeals to Georgia's mainstream middle
text:
Listen on Apple Podcasts, Google Play or Stitcher.
Host Greg Bluestein and The AJC's Washington correspondent Tamar Hallerman took a look at the broader messages candidates have aimed toward the middle of the electorate during the general election campaign for Georgia governor. Bluestein and Hallerman also provide an update on Georgia's 6th Congressional District race.
Politically Georgia releases new episodes every Monday, so be sure to subscribe on Apple Podcasts, Google Play or Stitcher to keep up with all things Georgia Politics.
